channel.title: Need a screenshot
channel.description:
hey everyone,
my boss approached me saying that the webpages don't display correctly in Safari. So I have already checked in IE, Firefox, Konqueror, and Opera, but since I don't have a mac and can't find safari for linux, I was wondering if people out there using macs could go to www.conifergdb.org and take some screenshots and then post them as attachments so I can take a look at them and figure out where the problem lies.
Preferably if you could take a screenshot of EVERY page that the Buttons up top take you to. I'd be greatly appreciative.
Regards

item.title: Need a screenshot
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Maybe you can use wine. I didn’t tried it yet though

Read full topic

item.title: Need a screenshot

item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Konqueror == Safari.
They both use the WebDev engine.

Read full topic
